item.title: AdGuard Home on a VPS
item.description: Learn how to set up AdGuard Home on a VPS and configure it to work with your router using WireGuard VPN. This setup will ensure that all DNS requests from your home network are routed securely through the VPN to AdGuard Home for filtering.

item.title: Timeshift - Automated Backups
item.description: Learn how to set up Timeshift on Linux to create automated snapshots of your system for easy recovery in case of issues.

item.title: Virtualization - Embedded Systems
item.description: Virtualization solutions within embedded systems play a crucial role, offering benefits in varied industries including automotive, aerospace and IoT. The contribution of this work is an overview of the current state-of-the-art, identifying open questions and outlining new developments. The methodology involves a systematic review of recent literature, which is categorized based on content and keywords. Central findings from existing studies are summarized according to different virtualization approaches and enhanced with new insights from the reviewed papers, allowing for future exploration of presented research directions.
